sent.orig: None of us would willingly choose Partner A. But what makes Partner B so wonderful?
sent.trans: 我们没有人会心甘情愿地选择舞伴A,但舞伴B好在哪？

sent.orig: And all the girls dreamed that they'd be your partner, they'd be your partner.
sent.trans: 所有的孩都梦想为的伴侣，她们会为的伴侣。

sent.orig: Marriage is not about finding the right partner -- it is about being the right partner.
sent.trans: 婚姻的成功不在于找到一个适合的伴侣，而是自己成为一个理想伴侣。

sent.orig: The resolution to expel a partner shall be delivered to the partner in writing.
sent.trans: 对合伙人的除名决议应当书面通知被除名人。

sent.orig: Partner B has high hopes for you as a dancing partner.
sent.trans: 舞伴B对你成为一个好舞伴，同样抱有有很大的希望。
